items.title: Ssumday to Start, Bang Leaves for EG, Bot Lane Questions
items.description:
Cole and Jordan are back for the fourth time (that’s 4 shows in 3 days for anyone keeping track at home) because SSUMDAY IS BACK. THE RETURN OF THE KIND KING. We had resigned ourselves to his departure. We had accepted that we’d never see another 1v2 in the toplane. We genuinely really like FakeGod. But it’s Ssumday. He’s back.

We also talk about Deftly, what’s going on in bot lane, and if Ry0ma is our starter.

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
3:42 - #TrustThePapa - The moment the #1 trending topic on Twitter began
7:02 - Ssumday’s back “as our starting top laner” - Top/Jungle synergy, implications for FakeGod
13:21 - Bang traded to Evil Geniuses (according to ESPN) - Bot lane is still up in the air
22:37 - Did EG leak the Bang trade?? - Why’d they do Deftly like that?
25:23 - 100T Sneaky? What’s our best look bot lane and what do the different options say about our approach to 2020?
30:56 - Are we a developmental team or a win-now team (or something in between)?
37:07 - Wrap up and what a time to be a Thieves fan



Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod

items.title: EMERGENCY SHOW: Meteos Returns??? 100 Thieves Free Agency News
items.description:
All aboard the 100Talk time machine as Cole and Jordan invoke their emergency pod powers and discuss 100T Meteos, starting jungler for our team, 100 Thieves, in the year of our Lord 2020. We talk about our feelings, the ongoing value of transparency and whether now is a smart time for PapaSmithy to go into more detail on Meteos' exit, and the revised outlook for 2020 with a confirmed lineup of ??? in top, Meteos in jungle, ??? in mid, ??? at ADC, and ??? at support.

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
2:10 - Meteos has returned - reactions to the announcement video
6:29 - Transparency, reasons for Meteos’ initial exit, and what should PapaSmithy say about the past?
16:42 - Meteos the player - what does it mean to have the strongest jungler 100T has ever fielded back on the rift? Potential synergies with other potential starters.
23:53 - Even more roster speculation - suddenly, Meteos is our only confirmed starter for 2020 what is happening



Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod

items.title: Free Agency: Ry0ma Joins 100T, Many Questions Remain
items.description:
Free agency is officially open, and the 100 Thieves roster dominoes are beginning to fall. Cole and Jordan come together for a brief discussion of what we know in the wake of ESPN's Free Agency special, and speculate regarding the glaring gaps in the current LCS contract database. The offseason is JUST getting started.

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
4:01 - Ry0ma to 100T confirmed by ESPN
12:38 - Ryu leaves 100T (favorite memory and a tribute)
16:54 - AnDa leaves 100T (favorite memory at IG’s expense)
19:45 - Fragas leaves 100T (cutest memory)
21:30 - JungleJuice gets 2-year extension as head of strategy
25:59 - Meteos rumored to be linked to 100T again
35:19 - Does Ssumday or Bang leave?

items.title: #TrustThePapa, End of (pr0lly)Watch, Zikz Hired, Amazing's Departure - 2020 100 Thieves LCS Preseason
items.description:
After an eventful day of LCS news, Cole and Jordan have a tea party to discuss PapaSmithy's first few Big Decisions™. We say goodbye to Amazing, pr0lly, and pr0llywatch, say hello to Zikz, and discuss what could be lurking on the horizon for 100T. Are we going to have a contender, or are we going to #TrustThePapa during a rebuilding season? Choose your adventure.

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
3:47 - Worlds Takeaways (Will China Ever Lose Again?)
10:00 - PapaSmithy Debuts as GM (esports Tom Hanks, Chalked season?, “Clear communication”, What to expect for 2020, Korean connection?)
24:32 - Zikz Debuts as Head Coach (Our pr0lly Watch is ended, Coaching philosophy, Developing NA talent, Does Zikz have pull?)
41:55 - Free Agency Looming (Amazing is looking for a new team, What do we expect at each position?)
53:15 - Listener/Twitch Chat Questions (Who stays to help “develop” new players?, Stick with the current korean imports Bang and Ssumday or swap one/both of them out for new imports?, Do you think we will stay in NA or import a mid?)
1:08:34 - Closing Thoughts / #TrustThePapa

items.title: Diary of an NA Fan - I Hate Cats
items.description:
Dear Diary,

It's me, NA Fan. I hate cats.

After a 1-2 day for NA that felt worse in some ways than an 0-3 day, Cole and Jordan reconvene to try and identify what’s salvageable amongst the wreckage of our 2019 Worlds hopes. Here’s what we find: the cat will continue to haunt our dreams. If these were the easier games I don’t want to see the hard ones. At least we aren’t FPX today.

Timestamps:
1:06 - Intro (Dear Diary,)
2:57 - TL vs IG
8:16 - CG vs FNC
14:51 - C9 vs HKA



Listen here.

items.title: Diary of an NA Fan - 10/12/19
items.description:
Dear Diary,

It's me, an NA fan. My heart beats fast for Team Liquid. I'm not sure Clutch even HAS a heartbeat...

Cole and Jordan are having so much dang fun watching Worlds 2019 that they’ve decided to talk about it. In this new series, “Diary of an NA Fan”, your favorite dads explain what it’s like to grasp desperately to optimism in the face of unfathomable historical underachievement. Today’s diary entry covers TL and CG’s opening games of the tournament.

TIMESTAMPS:

1:03 - Show start and series overview
4:10 - TL vs DAM
12:11 - CG vs RNG
21:17 - Day 2 (10/13/19) preview

Listen here.

items.title: KEEP IT 100 - 100 Thieves Roster Call-In Show
items.description:
You've asked endlessly about it, so we're giving it to you: finally, a call-in show for 100T fans to play fantasy GM. Cole and Jordan talk with callers about their proposed LCS rosters and grade the results. This is a genuine limited edition version of 100Talk that won't last long, so act today!

TIMESTAMPS:
6:27 - Jaret87 (Sign college talent)
22:14 - ShadowWing (Full aggro squad)
45:07 - YaBoyGraff (Importing an aggressive support)
1:03:15 - Ferjo0724 (5-alarm hot take)
1:20:15 - CozmikFlash (Go big or keep it steady)
1:34:51 - Blasian (Importing a steady support)

Listen here.


Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod

items.title: How to Fix 100T - End of 2019 Off-Season 100 Thieves Roster Show
items.description:
Despite an encouraging push for playoff in the summer split, the 2019 season failed to live up to expectations. With the dust settling and the summer split officially in the books, it’s time to look ahead. Cole and Jordan assess each of the starters from the end of the 2019 season and discuss what changes might be needed to return to winning ways in 2020. Plus, we announce the winner of our 100 Thieves Championship Jersey Giveaway!


Listen here.

items.title: Close But No Playoffs - 100T Trips at the Finish Line
items.description:
After forcing a tiebreaker for a chance at playoffs in dramatic fashion, 100T dropped their tiebreaker bid against OpTic Gaming. After two days, Jordan and Cole finally crawl out of their darkened bedrooms, wipe off the tears, and discuss what went wrong. We also assess FakeGod’s performance under pressure and what two splits out of playoffs means for 100 Thieves.


Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
3:45 - Red Rivalry Bet Update

12:04 - A disjointed team effort
19:20 - Ye Olde Huni’s revenge

31:40 - Ryu saves the season (multiple times)
35:35 - FakeGod shows up on Gangplank
37:31 - 100T vs OPT
43:37 - Karma? Bard? Breaking down an unfamiliar draft
50:37 - A less decisive showing
55:35 - Reviewing FakeGod under pressure
1:00:10 - Was this split successful?
1:04:47 - Paying 2nd most, finishing close to last
1:11:49 - Pr0lly Watch™ - the end of season edition
1:18:29 - Let’s end this season on a positive note.

items.title: 100T and the Sweet Smell of Playoffs - Win Lane, Win Game - 100 Thieves Summer 2019 Week 8
items.description:
The penultimate weekend of the summer split is in the books, and our ticket to the playoffs still isn’t punched. While Froggen’s champion ocean frustrates us again, FakeGod’s rematch against BrokenBlade lives up to the hype and more. Join Cole and Jordan as we summon the strongest 100Talk buff yet to deliver the team to playoffs.

Listen here.

items.title: 100 Thieves On The Razor's Edge - Crushed by C9, Crushed FLY
items.description:
After tasting the high highs and the low lows this weekend, 100 Thieves have only two weekends left to sneak into an LCS playoffs spot. We’re tied for 6th now, but do we have enough gas in the tank against a decently strong set of opponents? Jordan and Cole convene a meeting of the masses to discuss all this and more.


Listen here.

items.title: 100 Thieves Pushes for Playoffs, Wins Against Optic and Echo Fox - 100T Podcast
items.description:
The turnaround is real. LCS Summer Split 2019 has gotten super spicy  as 100 Thieves look to make their push into playoffs after starting the split in the proverbial abyssal void. The boys are close to a .500 record and are looking like they're in fine form. It's not going to be easy as the margin for error is slim.

After a 2-0 weekend featuring wins over Meteos' Optic Gaming and "Is This Guy Serious?" Solo's Echo Fox, Cole and Jordan are here to talk about 100T's chances at salvaging the year - and the hopes of Thieves fans everywhere.

TIMESTAMPS:
6:55 - 100T vs OPT
10:59 - Aphro’s BACK, BABY
15:11 - The CS elephant in the room
20:03 - How significant are these wins?
23:30 - Playing for (and taking) neutral objectives
26:11 - 100T vs FOX
27:37 - Solo vs FakeGod, Round 2
30:36 - “You can’t ban Ryu”
36:00 - A team full of carries
43:20 - Bang doubles his output
51:27 - Aphro appreciation thread
56:25 - Upholding our duty: Pr0lly watch
58:12 - Updated playoff chances

1:02:30 - Next week: C9 + FLY

items.title: Can 100 Thieves Still Make Playoffs? If We Dies, We Dies, FakeGod / BrokenBlade Beef
items.description:
We’re already on the second half of summer split and as time slips through our fingers, Cole and Jordan ask - can 100 Thieves still make playoffs? Will BrokenBlade ever take a chill pill and leave FakeGod alone? Will 100T lose game win playoffs? AND HOW WILL TEAMS DEAL WITH THE FULLY ACTUALIZED RYU??? All this and more with your favorite dads.


OH, AND WE ANNOUNCE THE WINNER OF OUR 100T ORIGINAL WINDBREAKER GIVEAWAY!

items.title: 100T Resurrection, 2-0 Weekend, Show Anniversary Spectacular
items.description:
And after the third week, 100T rose from the tomb in a glorified, perfected state. 100 Thieves are BACK after the first 2-0 weekend since week 3 of last split (and origin of the 100Talk buff). With things clicking, Jordan and Cole talk through just how many of this team’s problems are ‘solved’ and how many of them are ‘getting better.’ Will the 13-5 meme become reality???


Also, the dads take some time to celebrate 100Talk’s first birthday and reflect on some of their favorite moments of the show. And you know it ain’t a celebration unless some 100T apprel is being given away...

TIMESTAMPS:
4:36 - 100T vs C9
8:02 - Aggro Bang?!
13:18 - Engage Aphro??
17:14 - Coaches Smurfing?!!!?
18:50 - Aimbot Amazing? ? ? ?
23:55 - Also FakeGod
27:04 - 100T vs FQ (Lose Lane, Win Game)
36:09 - Ryu and resilience
41:27 - Is this the new norm? Is this a fluke?
47:23 - Pr0lly Watch
54:15 - Updated projections

items.title: Loss Streak is OVER! New look 100T improves with Amazing, Ryu, and FakeGod
items.description:
100 Thieves rolls the dice with the roster and it pays off as the LCS record futility streak comes to an end and 100T finally gets their first win of the split (and now we’re on a win streak, right?). Amazing lives up to his name while Ryu and FakeGod put in rock solid work. Now the fans are asking if THIS is the new look 100T. Will we continue to play FakeGod? Will Soligo return? Is Bang at risk for getting benched?


Cole and Jordan dive into these questions and more.

items.title: The Big Sad, Loss to Clutch Gaming, 0-2, A̶t̶l̶a̶s̶ Amazing
items.description:
Can Amazing Save 100T???

It’s too early to make any sweeping conclusions, but the outlook on this split is dire for 100 Thieves. Jordan and Cole break down another 0-2 weekend that included losses to TL and CG, talk about who’s pulling their weight, and debate whether A̶t̶l̶a̶s̶ Amazing can carry the burden for 100T (as he seems determined to). Reasonable Takes™ incoming.

TIMESTAMPS:
4:10 - 100T vs TL - Soligo MVP? Bang Throws?
20:47 - 100T vs CG - Does Heroic Defense Matter?
31:35 - Cole’s Stat of the Week
33:23 - Can you build around Ssumday? Is Soligo Amazing?
48:48 - When do we put FakeGod in? Is Amazing our most important player?
53:00 - Is the team environment broken beyond repair? Are our import players delivering enough value?
57:38 - Amazing: The Final Hope for 100T


Listen here.

items.title: Red Rivalry 2: Electric Boogaloo - Zach from League Leaders Banter Show
items.description:
Since we last spoke with our friend Zach from League Leaders, 100 Thieves is STILL undefeated against Clutch Gaming. For some reason, he thinks they can win this weekend. He comes on the show to attempt to make his argument before CG’s inevitable loss, and we pretend to listen…


(Producer’s Note: Zach is an awesome dude and this is all in good fun)

items.title: Xing Li talks Amazing & Soligo, start of The Split of Sorrow - 100 THIEVES LCS Summer Split 2019 Week 1
items.description:
We’re not going to lie to you: that was not the way we planned on 100T starting off. Week 1 saw the Thieves go 0-2, and Cole and Jordan are stuck asking themselves if this is going to be The Split of Sorrow. Fortunately, friend of the show (and crackerjack journalist) Xing Li is here to shed his perspective, plus share some of the juicier bits from his recent interviews with 100 Thieves’ new jungler Amazing and rookie midlaner Soligo.

We’ll answer the tough questions: Is Soligo going to make it? Are Pr0lly’s days numbered? And most importantly, WHO WON THE 100TALK DAD HAT GIVEAWAY???

Listen here.


Thanks to our guest Xing Li - Follow him on Twitter @xingtheli

Read his story on Amazing & Soligo here: https://dotesports.com/league-of-legends/news/100t-amazing-soligo-interview-may-2019

TIMESTAMPS:
1:23 - Esports Journalist Xing Li Talks Amazing + Soligo Interview
24:58 - 100T vs. CLG: Jet Lag + Yuumi = Big Yikes
32:46 - 100T vs. OpTic: OpTic Catches a Baron Throw
43:41 - pr0lly Watch
49:49 - Evaluating Soligo
58:22 - Maintaining an Optimistic Outlook in the Face of Extreme Adversity
1:00:51 - Week 2 Predictions (Another 0-2???)

1:04:38 - GIVEAWAY WINNER ANNOUNCEMENT (I can’t believe you won!)

items.title: LCS Returns! 100 Thieves Summer Split Preview
items.description:
The anticipation is killing us - LCS Summer Split 2019 starts this weekend. We're all eager to see the new (and hopefully improved) 100 Thieves. items.title: THE COD JOB - OCTANE + CROWDER talk CWL London, 100 Thieves' first championship, and prepping for Anaheim
items.description:

CWL London CHAMPIONS Octane and Crowder join 100Talk to discuss what this one means both personally and to the organization, the significance of adding an MVP trophy to the case, how this win changes things for the rest of the season, a look ahead to CWL Anaheim, and a run it up tatoo update.

HUGE thanks to Octane and Crowder for joining us.

items.title: Amazing Acquisition, Drop Day, Soligo Starts, and Ryu Returns
items.description:
100Talk is back and it's time for a family meeting. We'll talk about today's apparel drop experience, Amazing joining 100T, Soligo getting the starting nod, and the return of the man, the myth, the legend - Ryu.

And did someone say...giveaway? I dunno, maybe I misheard...

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
3:34 - MSI MEGA PREVIEW
5:18 - Drop-Day, Apparel, and A GIVEAWAY
19:49 - Amazing Joins the Thieves
36:13 - Soligo Returns at Mid
41:50 - Ryu Returns Also at Mid
46:41 - Summer 2019 Roster Overview
1:04:18 - Wrap-up and Bonus COD Job Announcement

items.title: THE COD JOB - Enable & Crowder - 100Talk Interviews 100 Thieves CoD Stars
items.description:
For the grand finale of our COD coverage leading up to CWL London, Crowder and Enable join 100Talk to discuss their path to this point, highs and lows of a wild season, the secrets behind 100T’s success both in COD and as an organization, predictions and expectations for London (and beyond), and which member of the squad is most likely to get a neck tat.


Huge thanks to Crowder and Enable for joining us before heading overseas!

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
2:47 - Intros and Path to 100T
12:03 - Starting From 0
22:39 - The Coach Difference
25:19 - Getting to 100
28:38 - Hardest Thing About Coaching
31:03 - Dealing WIth Criticism
34:54 - The Thieves Difference
40:00 - CWL London
47:41 - What Makes a Successful Season?
49:31 - Pool A Matchups/Most Anticipated Series
52:42 - Community Questions/Lightning Round
1:00:14 - Wrap Up

items.title: THE COD JOB! Interview with Eric "Muddawg" Sanders - 100 Thieves Head of Esports Operations
items.description:
100Talk is embarking on a new adventure, this time into the world of competitive CoD. Eric “Muddawg” Sanders - Head of Esports Operations for 100 Thieves - will be our guide as we look to educate ourselves (and our audience) on how we can be as good at watching CoD as the 100 Thieves squad is at obliterating the competition.

Is this the first #CODJob???? YOU decide!

Listen here.

TIMESTAMPS:
3:27 - Muddawg Intro/Background
6:38 - Qualifying for CWL
17:54 - “Positions” and Playstyles
25:58 - Nadeshot and Muddawg’s COD Play
29:36 - CWL Competitive Format
35:33 - Unique Factors of Competitive COD
41:01 - Thoughts on the CODBurner
45:15 - London Major
47:52 - Priestahh in Fort Worth
51:50 - What does a successful season look like?
54:40 - Phraseology 201: OAKBOYZ, Run it up, Double positive
59:39 - Wrap up
